name: Castform
flavorText:
CASTFORM’s appearance changes with
the weather.
This POKéMON gained the ability to use the vast power of nature to protect
its tiny body.
formDescription: Form changes along with type to match the weather in battle, due to forecast.  Castform is always in its normal form outside of battle, regardless of weather.

previous.name: Milotic
previous.flavorText:
Its lovely scales are described as
rainbow colored. They change color
depending on the viewing angle.

next.name: Kecleon
next.flavorText:
It changes body color to blend in with
its surroundings. It also changes color if
it is happy or sad.
